Description: Lower body sherd of South Ionian pottery cup with everted rim; interior glazed black with added red bands lined in white at top and bottom of sherd; exterior: glazed black (worn); red band lined in white near top of sherd; inscription on exterior.
Type series: Vallet and Villard Ionian cup type A1
Curator's comments: Schlotzhauer places the sherd in Type 8.Bg of South Ionian cup with everted rim. These cups are amongst the stylistically oldest South Ionian cups with everted rims at Naukratis.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 86)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 647, no. 48)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 49, no. 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.074) (Phase 3)
